attack-object.name: Active Scanning
attack-object.score-comment: This control can protect web applications from active scanning by an adversary. Because this protection is specific to web applications (although frequent targets) and not other application types, it has been scored as Partial.

attack-object.name: Exploit Public-Facing Application
attack-object.score-comment: This control can protect web applications from common attacks (e.g. SQL injection, XSS).

attack-object.name: Exploit Public-Facing Application
attack-object.score-comment: This control can detect common web application attack vectors.

attack-object.name: Network Service Scanning
attack-object.score-comment: This control can protect web applications from network service scanning by an adversary. Because this protection is specific to web applications (although frequent targets) and not other application types enumerated in the procedure examples of this technique (e.g. Active Directory), it has been scored as Partial.

attack-object.name: Network Service Scanning
attack-object.score-comment: This control can detect network service scanning of web applications by an adversary. Because this detection is specific to web applications (although frequent targets) and not other application types enumerated in the procedure examples of this technique (e.g. Active Directory), it has been scored as Partial.

attack-object.name: Application Layer Protocol
attack-object.score-comment: This control can protect against one of the sub-techniques of this technique while not providing protection for the remaining, resulting in a Minimal overall score.

attack-object.name: Application Layer Protocol
attack-object.score-comment: This control can detect one of the sub-techniques of this technique while not providing detection for the remaining, resulting in a Minimal overall score.
